outputs.output_descr: The Project will strengthen capacities of the Government of Montenegro and in particular Ministry of Foreign Affairs and European Integration (MFAEI) for overall coordination of EI process  with the focus on accession negotaition. To produce the Project goal, the project will facilitate the delivery of main inputs required for the effective role of the MFAEI and other ministries and stakeholders involved in the process of EU integration. These inputs include the advancement of the (1) institutional, (2) human resource, (3) technical and (4) knowledge platforms necessary for achievements of national priorities in the process of Accession to the EU. Although, project interventions will support overall Government efforts in this process, the project will focus on the Ministry of Foreign Affairs and European Integration which coordinates the Foreign Policy and European integration priorities of the Government of Montenegro.

project_descr: Strengthening capacities of the Government of Montenegro, and in particular Ministry of Foreign Affairs and European Integration (MFAEI) for overall coordination of European Integration (EI) process  with the focus on accession negotiations
